author: The Irish Times
title: Coronavirus: Trump claims China has most deaths despite official statistics
description: US president defends tweets which endorsed protests against state lockdowns
content:
US president Donald Trump has insisted deaths from Covid-19 are much higher in China than in the US, despite official statistics painting a far different picture.
China has more than four times the population of the US but has reported far fewer deaths, arou… [+5970 chars]
